reviews.review_msg: THE BEST TEACHER I HAVE EVER HAD!! THANK YOU FOR MAKING SFU LECTURES WORTH COMING TO!!!
one of the best profs. very concerned with everyone, on both a professional and personal level.

So disorganized! Our class was on women, poverty and the media, but it ended up being a class on the Downtown Eastside, as viewed by the National Film Board. Even tho it was a media course, she couldn't even use the computer. Horrible classroom, patronizing teacher, vague requirements for assignments and grades given back sporadically. Hated this!
